Modifie les paramètres personnalisés du cycle menstruel

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"isCycleTrackingEnabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Activer/désactiver le suivi du cycle","example":true},"usesExternalProvider":{"type":"boolean","description":"Activer/désactiver le fournisseur externe","example":false},"useMenopauseMode":{"type":"boolean","description":"Activer/désactiver le mode ménopause","example":false},"averageCycleLength":{"type":"number","description":"Durée moyenne du cycle (21-40 jours)","example":28,"minimum":21,"maximum":40},"averagePeriodLength":{"type":"number","description":"Durée moyenne des règles (3-10 jours)","example":5,"minimum":3,"maximum":10},"prefersManualInput":{"type":"boolean","description":"Préférer la saisie manuelle","example":false}},"title":"UpdateCycleConfigDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
